documents.document: Never underestimate the heart of a champion. Rudy Tomjanovich
#quotes I want Wipro to be among the top ten IT companies in the world.
#quotes Positive things happen to positive people.
It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get up. Vince Lombardi
#quotes All you need is ignorance and confidence; then success is sure.
If you care at all, youll get some results. If you care enough, youll get incredible results. Jim Rohn
Before borrowing money from a friend decide which you need most. AmericanProverb
#quotes It is not the strongest of the species that survive, nor the most intelligent, but the one most responsive to change.
Sandwich every bit of criticism between two thick layers of praise. Mary Kay Ash
A live dog is better than a dead lion.AmericanProverb
If you gladly stoop to the ground don't be surprised if they trample over you. Ethiopian Proverb
A river is made drop by drop. Afghan Proverb
#quotes The only question to ask yourself is, how much are you willing to sacrifice to achieve this success?
Small is the number of them that see with their own eyes, and feel with their own hearts Albert Einstein
#quotes I feel that luck is preparation meeting opportunity.
Democracy is better than tyranny. AmericanProverb
The only way to know how customers see your business is to look at it through their eyes. Daniel R. Scroggin
#quotes When we can identify a problem and face the problem with confidence and enthusiasm, the solution is on the way.
#quotes Never mistake activity for achievement.
Sooner or later, those who win are those who think they can. Richard Bach
Learn from the mistakes of others. You can't live long enough to make them all yourself. Eleanor Roosevelt
#quotes Action may not always bring happiness, but there is no happiness without action.
Never let the fear of striking out get in your way. Babe Ruth
A penny saved is a penny earned.AmericanProverb
Wealth is the product of man's capacity to think. Ayn Rand
People who enjoy what they are doing invariably do it well. Joe Gibbs
I don't want to be a passenger in my own life. Diane Ackerman
You cannot help men permanently by doing for them what they could do for themselves. Abe Lincoln
#quotes The goal here is to build a brand around social relevance in media (with his Participant Productions company).
When you have got an elephant by the hind legs and he is trying to run away, it's best to let him run Abe Lincoln
By others' faults wise men correct their own. AmericanProverb
#quotes Everybody should have the opportunity to do and be everything they can be.
#quotes If what you are doing is not moving you towards your goals, then it's moving you away from your goals.
Through perseverance many people win success out of what seemed destined to be certain failure. Benjamin Disraeli
The secret of success is constancy to purpose. Benjamin Disraeli
I am enough of an artist to draw freely upon my imagination Albert Einstein
Never let the fear of striking out get in your way. Babe Ruth
Always have your stuff when you need it with @Dropbox. FREE2GB account! http://t.co/psj89EZ
#quotes Opportunity is missed by most people because it is dressed in overalls and looks like work.
#quotes People with clear, written goals, accomplish far more in a shorter period of time than people without them could ever imagine
By different methods different men excel. AmericanProverb
#quotes Anger is nothing more than an outward expression of hurt, fear and frustration.
Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal. Henry Ford
Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect. - Mark Twain
#quotes Most people struggle with life balance simply because they haven't paid the price to decide what is really important to them.
Be patient with your enemies and forgiving of your friends. Afghan Proverb
The big shots are only the little shots who keep shooting. Christopher Morley
When you have decided what you believe, what you feel must be done, have the courage to stand alone and be counted. Eleanor Roosevelt
#quotes One dollar for eternal happiness? I'd be happier with the dollar.
#quotes He is extremely loyal to his friends, but he is tougher than anyone if he feels betrayed.
Afflictions are the good mans' treasure - but he'd rather buy it than bear it.AmericanProverb
"I've always believed that if you put in the work, the results will come. Michael Jordan
Victory is sweetest when you've known defeat. Malcolm Forbes
#quotes The trouble, in my opinion, with corporate America today, is that everything is thought of in quarters.
If you are not willing to risk the unusual, you will have to settle for the ordinary. JIM ROHN
#quotes Sometimes you make the right decision, sometimes you make the decision right.
Ask not what your teammates can do for you. Ask what you can do for your teammates Magic Johnson.
Anger dies quickly in a good man.AmericanProverb
#quotes It's your aptitude, not just your attitude that determines your ultimate altitude.
Coming together is a beginning. Keeping together is progress. Working together is success. Henry Ford
Destiny leads the willing but drags the unwilling. AmericanProverb
#quotes I have made the tough decisions, always with an eye toward the bottom line. Perhaps it's time America was run like a business.
#quotes We would accomplish many more things if we did not think of them as impossible.
#quotes The major difference between the big shot and the little shot is the big shot is just a little shot who kept on shooting.
One who plants grapes by the road side, and one who marries a pretty woman, share the same problem. Ethiopian Proverb
A deaf husband and a blind wife are always a happy couple. American Proverb
Courtesy is the password to safety. AmericanProverb
Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts. - Winston Churchill
Learn as much by writing as by reading. Lord Acton
Whatever good things we build end up building us. JIM ROHN
In the ditch where water has flowed, it will flow again Afghan Proverb.
There are no traffic jams along the extra mile. Roger Staubach
#quotes All forms of government ultimately are not going to succeed in trying to control or censor the Internet.
#quotes Miracles never cease to amaze me. I expect them, but their consistent arrival is always delightful to experience.
#quotes I quickly learned that if I kept at it and plowed right through the rejections I would eventually get somebody to buy my wares.
Abraham Lincoln
#quotes When we make college more affordable, we make the American dream more achievable.
Some men have thousands of reasons why they cannot do what they want to, when all they need is one reason why they can. Willis Whitney
Every person is responsible for his own looks after 40. Abe Lincoln
Deed done is well begun. AmericanProverb
Executives owe it to the organization and to their fellow workers not to tolerate nonperforming individuals in important jobs. Peter Drucker
#quotes I don't think about my fame very much and I don't dwell on success. Maybe that's one reason I'm successful.
Individual glory is insignificant when compared to achieving victory as a team. Dot Richardson
#quotes Doing what you love is the cornerstone of having abundance in your life.
The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall. Nelson Mandela
#quotes To be successful you have to enjoy doing your best while at the same time contributing to something beyond yourself.
The world of achievement has always belonged to the optimist. Harold Wilkins
#quotes The big secret in life is that there is no big secret. Whatever your goal, you can get there if you're willing to work.
I don't know who my grandfather was; I'm much more concerned to know what his grandson will be. Abe Lincoln
#quotes A brand for a company is like a reputation for a person. You earn reputation by trying to do hard things well.
Ability is what you're capable of doing. Motivation determines what you do. Attitude determines how well you do it. Lou Holtz
Remind people that profit is the difference between revenue and expense. This makes you look smart. Scott Adams
There is little success where there is little laughter. Andrew Carnegie
Fear the person who doesn't fear God. Afghan Proverb
#quotes A boat can't have two captains.
#quotes Whenever there is a a financial crisis, it is always the banks that get hit.
It's not that I'm so smart , it's just that I stay with problems longer . Albert Einstein
There are some defeats more triumphant than victories. Michel de Montaigne
The successful man will profit from his mistakes and try again in a different way Dale Carnegie.
